application.doc: Get information about the latest available update

method.name: GET
method.id: Get information about the latest available update
method.doc: To see information about the latest available update, issue a GET result on this endpoint. This API will return data provided by the Update notification service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service *

param.name: product_name
param.doc: The long product name. For example, "IBM Verify Identity Access"

param.name: product_shortname
param.doc: The short product name. For example, "ivia"

param.name: product_version
param.doc: The product version string, in the format N.N.N.N.

param.name: product_release_date
param.doc: The product version release date. This is a Unix timestamp.

param.name: overview
param.doc: An English language description of the new product version.

param.name: url
param.doc: A URL where the new product version can be downloaded. Note that this URL is intended for a browser, it is not a direct link to the new package file.

param.name: links
param.doc: Additional links for this version of the product.

param.name: url
param.doc: A URL to a resource related to the product version.

response.doc: Note that the latest version may also be the currently installed version.
